body:
You're using an outdated version of Eclipse and an outdated tutorial. Updating to "Eclipse neon" is a choice but you should really look at a different tutorial.

The Eclipse documentation offers an example and a step by step.

Here are some other sources, the IBM one is from 2008:

  • IBM: Plug-in development 101, Part 1: The fundamentals
  • Wideskills: Eclipse plugin tutorial
title: Which external jars do I have to import in my first eclipse plugin?
